--- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> 
>  ooc: Hey RD, can you answer my post with Blindfear/Perceptor plase?
>   robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote: Megatron waited patiently. How to 
deal with his former troops. He
> decided it best to deal with his current ones. "We are going to 
visit
> some former comerades. Dominjoe, if you haven't met them, you have 
at
> least heard of the Constructicons, and Soundwave. If they join us, 
all
> the better, but if they are still part of that renegade Decepticons
> group, then we shall obliterate them." he explained calmly.

 

::BLINDCHAOS AND DOMNIJOE::

    Domnijoe chuckled cheerfully. 
    "Hell...why not." she said, speeding off in the direction of 
Megatron's former comrads (I presume Meggy's giving her some 
directions!!). "If they're a pain, I'll help smuk 'em. If they're 
allies, I'll embrace 'em with open arms!!"
    Blindchaos seemed to glow with cheeriness as he spoke. Dom was 
glad she couldn't see his afterlife-forsaken smile.
    " And if they're not on you're side i get to play with them" The 
emphasis placed on 'play' was as such that Domnijoe KNEW the triple 
changer ment torture.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
**************
